string-array.name: food_1
string-array.item: The shredded meat rolled up by pancakes is very delicious.

string-array.name: foood_2
string-array.item: The roasted chicken adopts Chinese style flavor, combines our special cooking method, and scientifically matches with nutrition materials.

string-array.name: food_3
string-array.item: Eggs are always the best choice for side dishes

string-array.name: food_4
string-array.item: The single meal includes coke, French fries, hamburgers and other food

string-array.name: food_5
string-array.item: A double meal is twice the size of a single meal, and there is an extra coke

string-array.name: food_6
string-array.item: French fries box, which provides 4 kinds of sauces for big brands, can let you have a food with different taste at the same time

string-array.name: food_7
string-array.item: Coffee meal is a new western breakfast, including coffee, hot dog, corn, chicken and other food

string-array.name: food_8
string-array.item: Black pepper steak, low price, high nutrition

string-array.name: food_9
string-array.item: Chicken leg salad, including chicken leg, vegetables, and salad, rich in vitamins, delicious and cheap.

string-array.name: food_10
string-array.item: Hamburger lunch, big hamburger, coke, chicken wings, and egg tower, will definitely make you full

string-array.name: food_11
string-array.item: Golden Chicken \(5 pieces\) + 1 chocolate flavored waffle + 1 cup of sprouted bubble milk

string-array.name: food_12
string-array.item: Latte is more beautiful. Successful people like it

string-array.name: food_13
string-array.item: Panini adopts hot pressing technology, double fragrant and hot!

string-array.name: food_14
string-array.item: Package includes: 1 small table stewed meat with egg meal + 2 New Orleans grilled wings or 1 finger sucking chicken + Pepsi (middle)

string-array.name: food_15
string-array.item: Juice as a single product, let you choose more freely
